modal.are_you_sure_to_delete_report: Are you sure you want to delete this report?
modal.report_summary_includes_informatio: The report summary includes information such as report name, start date, end date, and any filters applied. If you want to see this information when you download your report then select "include summary".  If you don't select "include summary" then your download will include data only with no additional information about your report.
modal.API_URL_copied_to_clipboard: The API URL has been copied to the clipboard
modal.message.file_name_must_have_csv_ex: File name must have a .csv extension.
modal.message.file_name_must_not_exceed_: File name must not exceed 50 characters.
modal.message.file_name_must_be_alphanum: File name must be alphanumeric and may contain dashes.
modal.message.value_filter_cannot_be_nul: The value for a filter cannot be null.
modal.message.values_for_this_column_mus: Filter values for this column must be a number.
modal.message.report_API_allows_to_run_w: The report API allows you to run your Rakuten Marketing reports without logging into the dashboard.
modal.message.token_should_be_kept_secur: The token (or API key) shown in the URL should be kept as securely as your user name and password.
modal.message.report_name_is_limited_to_: Report Name is limited to 200 characters.
modal.message.report_name_must_be_unique: Report Name must be unique (case insensitive).
modal.message.report_category_is_limited: Report Category is limited to 200 characters.
modal.message.report_description_is_limi: Report Description is limited to 1000 characters.
modal.message.updating_API_token_will_in: Updating your API Token will invalidate the current token used for all of your reports.  If you use web services to pull any of your reports you will need to update those API calls with your new token.
modal.message.token_has_been_updated_suc: Your API Token has been updated successfully.
